akas: The Liar and His Lover World-wide (English title)

akas from release info: The Liar and His Lover World-wide (English title)
She Loves to Lie World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Episode 1

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

1.plot: High school student Yoon So Rim dreams of becoming a singer, but has trouble finding support. Meanwhile, producer Kang Han Gyul is famous and successful, but struggles in his personal life. (DramaFever)

2.title: Episode 2

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

2.plot: So Rim is over the moon when she finds Han Gyul again, but he's more worried about his song than finding love, and thus the lies begin. (DramaFever)

3.title: Episode 3

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

3.plot: Capitivated by her version of his song, Han Gyul searches for So Rim again. Teacher Bong tries to help jump-start So Rim's singing career.

4.title: Episode 4

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

4.plot: Chan Young is determined to produce So Rim's band's debut, but CEO Choi is bent on convincing Han Gyul, who's unaware of the newbies' identities. (DramaFever)

5.title: Episode 5

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

5.plot: So Rim soon becomes the only one out of the loop concerning Han Gyul's double life, yet she feels closer to him than ever before. (DramaFever)

6.title: Episode 6

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

6.plot: So Rim feels overwhelmingly hurt by Han Gyul's lies, and it affects her ability to perform. So Rim's band is chosen to compete on a survival reality program. (DramaFever)

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

7.plot: So Rim's band's performance on the broadcast surprises everyone, but it drives another wedge between Han Gyul and Chan Young. CEO Choi wants to capitalize on the newfound publicity. (DramaFever)

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

8.plot: Han Gyul obsesses over So Rim refusing to sing to his song. The company finds out about Crude Play's secret videos. (DramaFever)

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

9.plot: Yu Na wants the demo Han Gyul wrote for MUSH&Co to be her comeback single. CEO Choi confronts So Rim about her feelings for Han Gyul. (DramaFever)

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

10.plot: So Rim learns first-hand how fame can negatively affect one's dating life. Chan Young plans a team-building trip with MUSH&Co and Crude Play. (DramaFever)

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

11.plot: Photos of So Rim and Chan Young spark rumors of romance among fans and anti-fans. So Rim prepares to leave her grandmother alone while things cool down. (DramaFever)

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

12.plot: CEO Choi takes action when President Yoo begins to threaten SOLE Music N's existence. The Music Sketchbook broadcast becomes disastrous when tensions come to a head. (DramaFever)

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

13.plot: Chan Young makes a major decision for himself, but the effects on So Rim are damaging. Crude Play must finally prove themselves as real musicians. (DramaFever)

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

14.plot: Han Gyul suspects there is more to In Ho's accident than meets the eye. Jin Woo becomes frustrated with his unrequited feelings. (DramaFever)

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

15.plot: Han Gyul resolves to change his passive ways so that Crude Play won't end up hurt again. President Yoo decides to pull the plug on SOLE Music N. (DramaFever)

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: The Liar and His Lover (TV Series 2017)

16.plot: Having admitted to their lies, Crude Play's future hangs in the balance. MUSH&Co's future is uncertain as well, as President Yoo only sees So Rim's star potential. (DramaFever)

imdb.plot outline: Lee Hyun Woo (Moorim School, The Technicians) and Joy (from K-pop group Red Velvet) star in an adaptation of the runaway hit Japanese manga. When a genius composer with a hidden identity meets a girl with a beautiful voice, it is love at first sound. Finding true love with hidden identities, though, is a bit complicated. Kang Han Kyul (Lee Hyun Woo) is a famous, and very talented, composer. Having worked for a famous band long before they were stars, he has achieved a lot more in his youth than most do in their careers. However, he has fallen into a deep depression and no longer seems to have any motive to live. That is until he hears a voice that strikes a chord in his heart. Yoon So Rim (Joy) is a high school student. She has a voice unlike any Kang Han Kyul has ever heard. Yoon So Rim sees the pain in the sound composer's heart. Through her kindness and serenity, she convinces him to return to life. And through her voice, she makes her way into his heart. The problem, though, is that Kang Han Kyul intentionally hid his identity from Yoon So Rim. So for a man who has fallen in love, is it even possible for it to be real when you are hiding your true who you really are?
imdb.title: The Liar and His Lover
plot: Lee Hyun Woo (Moorim School, The Technicians) and Joy (from K-pop group Red Velvet) star in an adaptation of the runaway hit Japanese manga. When a genius composer with a hidden identity meets a girl with a beautiful voice, it is love at first sound. Finding true love with hidden identities, though, is a bit complicated. Kang Han Kyul (Lee Hyun Woo) is a famous, and very talented, composer. Having worked for a famous band long before they were stars, he has achieved a lot more in his youth than most do in their careers. However, he has fallen into a deep depression and no longer seems to have any motive to live. That is until he hears a voice that strikes a chord in his heart. Yoon So Rim (Joy) is a high school student. She has a voice unlike any Kang Han Kyul has ever heard. Yoon So Rim sees the pain in the sound composer's heart. Through her kindness and serenity, she convinces him to return to life. And through her voice, she makes her way into his heart. The problem, though, is that Kang Han Kyul intentionally hid his identity from Yoon So Rim. So for a man who has fallen in love, is it even possible for it to be real when you are hiding your true who you really are?
